content: Here's the info: I volunteered at the Charity Gala for Children's Education on April 2nd, helped with registration and coat check duties, and got to meet the founder of the charity. I also participated in the Bike-a-Thon for Cancer Research in late April, cycled 20 miles, and our team raised over $5,000. Additionally, I attended a fundraiser dinner on May 10th organized by "Women Empowering Women" and helped organize a charity yoga event in mid-May, which raised $600 for a local animal shelter. Oh, and I almost forgot - I walked 5 kilometers at the Walk for Hunger event on March 14th, raising $250 for local food banks.
